original_title: Northern Pike Invasion: Fishing the 60th Parallel
overview: Located just below the 60th parallel in Canada in what is one of the last inhabited places before the North Pole, is an amazing place known as Scott Lake Lodge, home to some of the best big northern pike and giant lake trout to be found anywhere on earth. Join us for an amazing sight-fishing adventure as we attempt to do this rare fishermanâ€™s paradise justice in this unique film.
title: Northern Pike Invasion: Fishing the 60th Parallel
